Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory261.png'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'It\'s the fake "Bianca"... Huaxu\'s signature.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Then let's move out!", 3: '9'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...Finally slipped up, didn't you?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's go. No time to waste.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Only by saving Babylonia will humanity have a future.', 4: '3'}
{2: "That's right!", 3: '13'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory47.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Find out why!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "There's power fluctuation in the immersion frame!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Team 2, connect the auxiliary interlay emergency power supply!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hey! Asimov! Can't you have the Gray Ravens initiate an emergency evac?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'The intruders have hijacked the immersion module! If we take the immersion module offline now, all uplinked consciousness will be severely impacted!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Constructs can be rebooted, but for humans... that may be fatal!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '...Dammit! Why the **** do you always make something so dangerous?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Quit fighting! Karenina, get over here and help me set up the jumper!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Coming!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Preliminary estimation of the chance of failure... more than 69.7%. But... all we can do is try.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory263.png'}
{3: 'Babylonia DECK-4-2-C, the archives of the intelligence department.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: 'I see... The commander sure is laying out all his cards on the table.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The usually heavily guarded archives are now empty, and only the security door is locked.'}
{3: 'Murray approaches the security door and opens it with the ID card he just got.'}
{3: '*High clearance user detected. Manual review requested.*'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Manual review...? Uh oh...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Murray anxiously looks at the security door, then quickly scans the room for a place to hide.'}
{3: 'â€”But there is nothing for him to hide behind in the small, empty room.'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "So if a turret comes down from the ceiling, I'll just have to face it head-on...", 4: '1'}
{3: '*Manual review request not responding. Request timed out.*'}
{3: '*Activating maximum security procedure.*'}
{3: 'Murray looks around the room again and finds a security gate lowering in front of the door he came through.'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "So, I'm stuck here if I can't open this door, huh?", 4: '1'}
{3: '*External interruption detected. Activating Wartime Evacuation Procedure B. Security door has been closed. Opening emergency passageway.*'}
{3: 'The safety door opens inward, and the air begins to make a hissing sound as it circulates between the two spaces.'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "...Sigh. Don't make me come back here again.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Murray walks through the safety door.'}
